title: Konti | Design Studio
text: Experience beautifully designed spaces crafted from recycled steel and/or up-cycled shipping containers, combining sustainability with structural resilience to withstand global climate challenges. Using modular construction, we build long-lasting spaces in harmony with nature. In the wake of Hurricane Maria's devastation, visionary architect Carla Gautier founded KONTi—a pioneering initiative that transforms shipping containers into affordable, durable homes. Discover how her innovative approach not only redefines sustainable living but also offers a beacon of hope and resilience for Puerto Rico. Watch the video to see industrial ingenuity meet compassionate design in a journey toward a stronger future. by preventing emissions through sustainable building practices.
